name: Miku Party Hard Mode v0.1
description:
Changes 7chan's PARTY HARD theme into a Miku PARTY HARD theme.
Note: This will change all of 7chan into Miku PARTY HARD mode. Until wildcards are allowed, there's nothing I can do.

To do: Create a Greesemonkey script to alter FLYING HORSE DONGS to LEEKS and/or change the background music.
